Step 1.Planning: Pick up the plastic bag from the clothes dryer

Step 2.Planning: Place the plastic bag on a flat surface

Step 3.Planning: Smooth out any wrinkles in the plastic bag

Step 4.Planning: Fold the plastic bag in half

Step 5.Planning: Fold the plastic bag in half again

Step 6.Planning: Fold the plastic bag into a smaller rectangle

Step 7.Planning: Smooth out any remaining wrinkles in the folded plastic bag
